text: sinhasananni (ars nu) mosevaru mariyu dani cuttu undevaru (daivadutalu), tama prabhuvu pavitratanu koniyadutu, ayananu stutistu untaru. Mariyu ayana mida visvasam kaligi untaru. Mariyu visvasincina vari koraku ksamabhiksa korutu: "O ma prabhu! Nivu ni karunyam mariyu ni jnananto prati danini avarinci unnavu. Kavuna pascattapanto ni vaipunaku marali, ni marganni anusarince varini ksamincu; mariyu varini bhagabhagamande narakagni siksa nundi kapadu
